title: Ballet robotique
brief_description: This dynamic and playful work examines the use of robots in American industry. Exploiting the visual joys of the kinetic robotic motion set to a soundtrack by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra, this lightly humorous film show the industrial replacement of humans in tedious and hazardous tasks.
